name: Adopted Local Plan

housing-numbers.notes: Total supply includes 21,006 from allocations and permissions plus 766 windfall allowance (200 villages + 566 borough-wide). Allocated housing (14,236) and committed housing (6,770) are separate components totaling 21,006. Mixed use sites contributing 4,295 dwellings are included in allocations.
